column5: Hello fellow Canucks. Does anyone know of any good Canadian online stores that carry all the major brands of rods & reels? I've been looking for a while but can't seem to locate any. Thanks for any suggestions.
here's my favoriteswww.thefishinhole.comwww.wholesalesports.comwww.sirmailorder.comwww.russellsports.com All are exeptional to deal with.
You might also try le baron. They are based out of montreal with stores in ottawa and toronto. lebaron.ca
